title: Bitcoin Dominance Surges 4.4% to 57% as BTC Hits Record $104,000, Challenging Altcoin Season Narrative
description: Bitcoin has surged to an all-time high of $104,000, pushing its market dominance up by 4.4% to 57%.
author: by Ruholamin Haqshanas

title: Bitcoin ETFs See Record Monthly Inflows of $6.2B as BTC Price Nears $100K
description: The surge is largely driven by Bitcoin’s rise toward the $100,000 mark, bolstered by President-elect Donald Trump’s promises to reshape crypto regulations.
author: by Veronika Rinecker

title: Japan’s Remixpoint to Buy $3.2M Worth of BTC With Its Balance Sheet
description:
The stock market-listed Japanese firm Remixpoint will use its balance sheet to buy $3.2 million worth of Bitcoin (BTC).



Per an official Remixpoint release and a report from the Japanese-language media outlet CoinPost, the company said it will spend 500 million yen on BTC purchases before the...
author: by Tim Alper

title: Bitcoin Spot ETFs See $1B Inflows as BTC Price Inches Near $100K
description:
Spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) saw a significant boost on Nov. 21, attracting $1b in net inflows. This surge in investments was likely driven by the launch of options trading for these funds earlier this week, pushing Bitcoin closer to $100k.



The asset last traded around $98,970, and...
author: by Shalini Nagarajan

title: Bitfinity Network Launches EVM-Compatible Bitcoin Layer 2, Backed by $12 Million in Funding
description: A key feature enabled by Bitfinity is that it makes it possible to write and deploy smart contracts (Ethereum-like capability) on Bitcoin.
author: by Veronika Rinecker
